enWisdom: Negligence is the most harmful enemy
Negligence is the most harmful enemy
Negligence is the trait of the foolish
Negligence is the misguidance of souls and the symbol of misfortunes

Wisdom: احْذَرُوا الْغَفْلَةَ فَإِنَّهَا مِنْ فَسَادِ الْحِسِّ
enWisdom: Be cautious of negligence, for indeed it is from the corruption of [one’s sensory] perception

Wisdom: احْذَرْ مَنَازِلَ الْغَفْلَةِ وَالْجَفَاءِ وَقِلَّةَ الْأَعْوَانِ عَلَى طَاعَةِ اللَّهِ
enWisdom: Avoid [building homes in] places of negligence and wickedness and [places where] there is a paucity of supporters for the obedience of Allah

Wisdom: إِنْ كُنْتُمْ لِلنَّجَاةِ طَالِبِينَ فَارْفُضُوا الْغَفْلَةَ وَاللَّهْوَ وَالْزَمُوا الِاجْتِهَادَ وَالْجِدَّ
enWisdom: If you seek of prosperity, then reject negligence and diversion, and espouse diligence and effort

Wisdom: سُكْرُ الْغَفْلَةِ وَالْغُرُورِ أَبْعَدُ إِفَاقَةً مِنْ سُكْرِ الْخُمُورِ
enWisdom: The intoxication of negligence and delusion is harder to recover from than the intoxication of wines [and alcoholic drinks]

Wisdom: شِيمَةُ الْعُقَلَاءِ قِلَّةُ الشَّهْوَةِ وَقِلَّةُ الْغَفْلَةِ
enWisdom: The [distinguishing] quality of the people of intellect is [their] lack of lust and negligence
Taking repose in negligence is delusion

Wisdom: فَأَفِقْ أَيُّهَا السَّامِعُ مِنْ غَفْلَتِكَ وَاخْتَصِرْ مِنْ عَجَلَتِكَ وَاشْدُدْ أَزْرَكَ وَخُذْ حِذْرَكَ وَاذْكُرْ قَبْرَكَ فَإِنَّ عَلَيْهِ مَمَرَّكَ
enWisdom: Listener, awaken from your negligence, reduce your hastiness, brace yourself, be on your guard and remember your grave, for indeed you must pass through it

Wisdom: وَيْحَ ابْنِ آدَمَ مَا أَغْفَلَهُ وَعَنْ رُشْدِهِ مَا أَذْهَلَهُ
enWisdom: ] Woe to the son of Adam! How heedless and negligent of his salvation he is!

Wisdom: وَيْحَ النَّائِمِ مَا أَخْسَرَهُ قَصُرَ عَمَلُهُ وَقَلَّ أَجْرُهُ
enWisdom: Woe to the sleeper, how great is his loss! His actions fall short and his reward is little
There is no heedlessness [and delusion] like reliance on the times
